page.title: 14The Village School.
page.content: Our school is quite a small school.We have a G.P.Room,a Resource Room and two classrooms.The G.P.Room is used for gym and we have our shool dinners there.In the Resource Room we have our school library.Primaries 1,2,3 and 4 use the largest classroom and Primaries 5,6 and 7 use the other room. There are four teachers in our school. They are Mrs Robb,Headteacher,and Miss Campbell who teach full time.Mrs Wight and Mrs Hardie,who work part time. Mrs Reid is our auxilliary.Mrs Weir keeps the school nice and clean and Mrs Brown cooks us delicious school dinners. There are 42 children in the school.We all enjoy doing project work,painting, music,and sometimes we like our maths and language work as well.We all like going to school in Crawford.
